channel.title: Mandarin Meritus on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Mandarin Meritus on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: First day @ Singapore
item.description: Viewing Singapore through a lens of mother of 22 months old baby was not fun all the time but enjoyed our stay there for 9 days. Actually this journey is because of Santanu who went almost every year after returning to India. Each time after his official trip he use to complain about his loneliness and etc. So this time we made sure to accompany him. But what a luck! he was damn busy in his office.
